mapper.sql: w.id, w.code, w.type, w.status, w.refID, w.msg, w.createBy, w.createTime, w.updateBy, w.updateTime, w.version, w.isDeleted, w.url, w.title, w.auditor, w.callback

where 1=1 and w.id = #{condition.id} and w.code = #{condition.code} and w.type = #{condition.type} and w.status = #{condition.status} and w.refID = #{condition.refID} and w.msg = #{condition.msg} and w.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and w.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and w.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and w.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and w.version = #{condition.version} and w.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and w.url = #{condition.url} and w.title = #{condition.title} and w.auditor = #{condition.auditor} and w.callback = #{condition.callback}

where 1=1 and w.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(w.code) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.code}),'%')) and UPPER(w.type) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.type}),'%')) and UPPER(w.status) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.status}),'%')) and UPPER(w.refID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.refID}),'%')) and UPPER(w.msg) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.msg}),'%')) and UPPER(w.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(w.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(w.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(w.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(w.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(w.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(w.url) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.url}),'%')) and UPPER(w.title) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.title}),'%')) and UPPER(w.auditor) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.auditor}),'%')) and UPPER(w.callback) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.callback}),'%'))
mapper.update: update worklist set code=#{code}, type=#{type}, status=#{status}, refID=#{refID}, msg=#{msg}, createBy=#{createBy}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, url=#{url}, title=#{title}, auditor=#{auditor}, callback=#{callback}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from worklist w where w.id = #{id} and w.isDeleted = false
